epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.server.request

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • epfl.lsr.bachelor.project.server.request.Request
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomicAction
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadRequest, VoidRequest, WriteRequest

    public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomicAction
    Represent an abstract request
    Author:
    Gregory Maitre & Patrick Andrade

      • notifyRequestPerformed

        public void notifyRequestPerformed(Request request)
        Enables to notify the thread in waiting-mode that the request has been performed. This must be called after performing the request
        Parameters:
        request - the request that has been performed

      • isMessageEmpty

        public boolean isMessageEmpty()
        Enables to know if the the message to be returned after performing the request is empty
        Returns:
        true if the message is empty, false otherwise
